name: Curated Newsletter Swipefile
description: Make sending your weekly newsletter a breezeCreate your newsletter in minutes with this Notion template. Easily collect and categorize resources to share in your newsletterQuickly assemble your newsletter each week without the hassle of searching for content Consistently provide valuable content to your subscribers with this simple and effective template.
features: Easily collect and categorize resources to share in your newsletter; Quickly assemble your newsletter each week without the hassle of searching for content; Consistently provide valuable content to your subscribers with this simple and effective template.
